hadith.text: It was narrated from Musa bin 'Ali that his father said:"I heard 'Uqbah bin 'Amir say: 'There are three times during which the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) forbade us from praying or burying our dead: When the sun had clearly started to rise until it was fully risen, when it was directly overhead at noon until it has passed the zenith, and when it was close to setting until it had fully set
